mapper.select: select video_id, video_title, introduce, video_path, is_forward_allowed, video_datetime, video_play_count,video_barrage_count, video_thumb_up_number, video_coin_number,video_star_number, video_forward_number,user_name from video,user where video.fk_user_id=user.user_id and video.video_id=#{videoId};
